DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Yoga may improve symptom quality life reduce stress patient ovarian cancer breast cancer may help live comfortably . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study well yoga work control symptom reduce stress woman ovarian cancer breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Yoga Controlling Symptoms Reducing Stress Women With Ovarian Cancer Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine feasibility implement restorative yoga intervention complementary supportive therapy woman ovarian breast cancer . - Measure change fatigue , psychosocial distress ( anxiety , depression ) , psychological well-being ( positive emotion ) , overall quality life baseline completion study treatment . OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients undergo 75-minute restorative yoga session week 10 week . Patients complete questionnaire regard fatigue , psychological distress ( anxiety , depression ) , positive affect , quality life baseline , immediately final yoga session , 2 month final yoga session .
